translation.start.narration:
Welcome to the Alexa Presentation Language Demo for Skill Flow Builder. 
    <break time='1.0s'/>    
    You can now easily add visuals to your Alexa Skill using APL templates, custom commands, and animations. 
    <break time='1.0s'/>
    In addition, the dynamic pager system makes it easy to create slide shows using built in layouts, as well as mix and match custom layouts that you create. 
    <break time='1.0s'/>
    Are you ready to hear more?
translation.start.reprompt: Are you ready to hear more?
translation.templates.narration:
Great! Starting with a simple scene in skill flow builder,
    <break time='1.0s'/>
translation.commands.narration:
You can add a *show section to any scene to add visuals to that scene.  
    <break time='1.0s'/>
translation.commands-0.narration:
Further show sections can invoke commands on your loaded APL file,
    <break time='1.0s'/>
translation.commands-1.narration: to trigger actions, such as making an image appear on the screen.
translation.commands-2.narration:
Or starting animations to bring your screens to life.
    <break time='1.0s'/>
    Are you ready to hear more?
translation.commands-2.reprompt: Are you ready to hear more?
translation.dynamic-pager.narration: To make life easier, the dynamic pager template allows you to create a slideshow out of a collection of layouts,
translation.dynamic-pager-0.narration: allowing you to easily customize the look and feel of each scene.
translation.dynamic-pager-1.narration: The first example layout is called the Background Layout, you can use it to display full screen images.
translation.dynamic-pager-2.narration: And intermix spoken text along with the slide show.
translation.sequence.narration: Next is the Sequence layout, used for listing items, such as for a shop in the game, or actions to take. The user can interact via voice or by touch events.
translation.sequence-1.narration: Or create your own layouts to customize your visuals. Like making a dice roll in your game.
translation.sequence-3.narration:
Using APL with Skill Flow Builder is easy, that's it for now.

    I'll leave you with a dice demo just for fun.
translation.dice-menu.narration: Please choose from one of the dice shown on the screen, or touch them to select.
translation.dice-menu.reprompt: Please choose from one of the dice shown on the screen, or touch them to select.
translation.say-end-of-demo-message.narration: That's the end of the demo, you can keep rolling for fun.
